function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited data collection due to COVID-19 restrictions","Impact":"Restricted generalizability of findings to other geographic areas","Mitigation":"Conduct follow-up research in other geographic areas using media stories and online photographs","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, online research platforms","People":"Researcher, data collection team","Owner":"Researcher, research institution"},{"Description":"Need for rapid communication during crises","Impact":"Delay in providing critical information during events such as earthquakes, floods, or hurricanes","Mitigation":"Rapid deployment of paper signs, pens/markers, duct tape for quick identification and communication","Technologies":"Paper signs, writing implements, communication tools","People":"Government agencies, emergency response teams","Owner":"Government agencies, emergency response teams"},{"Description":"Operational changes for retailers to operate under social distancing","Impact":"Ineffective communication and implementation of safety regulations for social distancing","Mitigation":"Training on effective use of signs and communication methods for social distancing","Technologies":"Training materials, communication tools, signage","People":"Retailers, employees","Owner":"Retailers, management teams"}]}
